attributes.action: Give a bank holiday if England's men's national football team win the 2021 Euros
attributes.additional_details: After a difficult year of lockdowns and Covid, a new national public holiday in celebration of the England team's win would bring people together and help unite the country.
attributes.background: Create a one off bank holiday in August to celebrate if England's men's football team win the 2021 Euro tournament.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Bank Holiday Monday if England get to the finals of the Euro’s 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590584

Give the UK a Bank Holiday on Monday July 12th if England win Euro 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590282
